title: Screensaver not killed when resume event detected
description: Wayland CGO detection working: idle/resume callbacks fire correctly. Resume event reaches daemon onActivity(). BUT StopScreensaver() fails to kill kitty process. Investigate SystemD.StopScreensaver() - processID/cmd may be nil. Latest code has verbose logging in cmd/daemon/main.go and internal/systemd/systemd.go. Install latest, trigger screensaver, move mouse, check journalctl to see exact failure.
